title: President says impartial investigation, strict enforcement of law compulsory
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa visited the Aluthgama and Beruwala areas Wednesday evening. During the visit the President said that an impartial investigation into the situation that arose in Aluthgama and Beruwala as well as strict enforcement of law against the perpetrators is compulsory.
